name: Power and Control Mechanisms
description: Analyzing how these personalities establish, maintain, and defend their control structures.

cards.title: Psychopaths in Positions of Power
cards.description: Understanding how psychopaths infiltrate and maintain authority in organizations.
bulletpoints: Psychopaths often hold high-ranking positions in corporations, politics, and law enforcement.
They create networks of loyal subordinates who follow them without question.
Eliminating their influence requires exposing their unethical or illegal behaviors to their superiors.

cards.title: Sociopaths and Street-Level Control
cards.description: How sociopaths dominate environments through intimidation and violence.
bulletpoints: Sociopaths maintain power through physical intimidation and erratic aggression.
They lack long-term vision but use extreme loyalty to maintain their position.
Disrupting their control involves isolating them from their support structure.

cards.title: Narcissists in Social Leadership
cards.description: How narcissists manipulate and leverage social dynamics for influence.
bulletpoints: Narcissists use charm and persuasion to rise in social hierarchies.
They create smear campaigns to eliminate rivals and maintain dominance.
Undermining their power requires exposing their contradictions and ego-driven failures.
